name: Echo Nine
description: Echo Nine is intended to be reminiscent of the old arcade classic space shooters like Galaga or Gaplus.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Microsoft Windows Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 650 Or Higher Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: N/A
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Microsoft Windows Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce650 Or Higher Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: N/A
